**Request for Information (RFI): Syndicated Research Studies**

**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
===============================================================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Government of Canada (GC) invites suppliers to submit information in response to this Request for Information (RFI) for syndicated public opinion research studies.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **RFI Reference Number**: WS4300459433-Doc4308247078
* **Publication Date**: November 16, 2023
* **Closing Date**: December 30, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

**Objective**
------------

The GC is seeking to access syndicated research studies that address its research needs related to priority issues. The research studies must be available for purchase through a government-wide subscription.

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

Suppliers must submit detailed information about the available syndicated public opinion research studies, including the subscription options and any additional costs associated with the studies.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

For more information, please visit the Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18028713?extsite=MTgwMjg3MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18028713?extsite=MTgwMjg3MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Djona-Guiadem, Cyrielle (SPAC/PSPC)
cyrielle.djona-guiadem@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
